#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <algorithm>

using namespace std;
typedef unsigned long long ull;	

int main(){
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	std::vector<ull> v(1000001);
	ull temp1,temp2,x;
	v[1]=0;
	v[2]=1;
	v[3]=1;
	for (int i = 4; i < 1000001; ++i)
	{
		v[i]=(v[i-2]+v[i-3])%1000000009;
	}
	while(t--){
		cin>>x;
		cout<<v[x]<<endl;
	}
}
